alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 10 at 4:54PM AKDT until June 10 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA MAINLY FROM BETHEL NORTH AND EAST... * Winds...North 15 to 25 mph. Gusts to 30 mph over elevated terrain. * Timing...Hot, dry, and windy conditions ongoing. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Temperatures...70 to 75 degrees. * Location...Kuskokwim Delta north and east of Bethel. This includes the villages of Bethel, Kwethluk, Akiachak, Akiak, Tuluksak, Upper and Lower Kalskag. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
